mapper.select: SELECT s.*, d.departmentName, file.totalUnit FROM (student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.departmentId = d.id) LEFT JOIN student_gradefile file ON s.id = file.id
SELECT s.*, pq.quizContent from student s LEFT JOIN passwordquiz pq ON s.passwordQuestion = pq.quizCode WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT Student (id, name, departmentId, grade, entranceType, password, password2, passwordQuestion, passwordAnswer, email, completeSemester) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{departmentId}, #{grade}, #{entranceType}, #{password}, #{password2}, #{passwordQuestion}, #{passwordAnswer}, #{email}, #{completeSemester})
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET departmentId = #{departmentId}, grade = #{grade}, password = #{password}, password2 = #{password2}, passwordQuestion = #{passwordQuestion}, passwordAnswer=#{passwordAnswer}, email = #{email}, completeSemester = #{completeSemester} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE student SET password = #{password}, password2 = #{password2} WHERE id=#{id}
